means: （在社团等会议上）执行宗教仪式的牧师（或俗人）

sentence.Network_en: He joined the 40th Division as an army chaplain.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以随军牧师的身份加入第40师。

sentence.Network_en: "Let us pray," said the Methodist chaplain.
sentence.Network_cn: “我们来祈祷吧，”那个循道宗牧师说。

sentence.Network_en: He had a distinguished record as a chaplain.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个牧师他成就卓著。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 牧师(CHAPLAIN)：传诵战团信念，激发部队勇气的长官。背包有磁铁改装，更利于喷射背包牧师突击肉搏。
"随军牧师"(chaplain)一词,本身也是从这一时期开始使用的. 公元4世纪的一个传说称,一位名叫图尔斯.马丁的异教罗马士兵,碰到了一个.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... villain 坏人,恶棍 chaplain 礼拜堂牧师 billionaire 亿万富翁.
西方宗教英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... priest 牧师 chaplain 教堂牧师 evangelist 传教士.

list.abs: father March was an army chaplain in the Civil War and in his absence Jo declared herself to be the man the family .父亲马奇是南北战争时期的军队牧师，他不在家期间，乔自命为一家之主。
the chaplain said the last rites .牧师作了最后的仪式。

in late 1944 , as he cajoled his flagging troops to defeat the Germans in the Battle of the Bulge , General George S. Patton turned to his chief chaplain for help .在1944年底，巴顿将军于高登腹地之役，激励其颓势部队打败德军时，他转而求助于随军的主任牧师。

does your job pointless ? are problems at home draining your zest for work ? is your boss a blithering idiot ? then why not consult the company chaplain ?你感觉工作毫无意义？家庭问题在拖你工作的后腿？老板是个喋喋不休的蠢蛋？那么为什么不向企业牧师咨询一下呢？

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French chapelain, from medieval Latin cappellanus, originally denoting a custodian of the cloak of St Martin, from cappella, originally 'little cloak' (see chapel)

entry.tran: (医院、学校、监狱、军队等的)牧师，神父
entry.def: A chaplain is a member of the Christian clergy who does religious work in a place such as a hospital, school, prison, or in the armed forces.

example.ex: He joined the 40th Division as an army chaplain.
example.tran: 他以随军牧师的身份加入第40师。

means.word_mean: 1. a clergyman ministering to some institution

list.explanation: (军队用语)(常用于命令式)别发牢骚了。我帮不了你忙

example.en: Stop telling me your troubles because I am not interested ；go and see the chaplain.
example.zh: 别再向我叹你的苦经了, 我不感兴趣,你走吧，我帮不了你忙。

auth_sentence.content: The hospital chaplain was prohibited from coming anywhere near us.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hospital chaplain was prohibited from coming anywhere near us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hospital chaplain was prohibited from coming anywhere near us.

auth_sentence.content: Just made fifth chaplain of his patron lord.

means.word_mean: (军队、医院、监狱等的)牧师;犹太教教士
